Title: The Border Post
Writer: Rajko Grlic (screenplay), Ante Tomic (novel), Ante Tomic (screenplay)
Actors: Toni Gojanovic, Sergej Trifunovic, Emir Hadzihafizbegovic, Verica Nedeska
Plot: A small border post on the Yugoslav-Albanian border in the spring of 1987. Frustrated and always drunk, lieutenant Pasic feels a strange pain in his groins. He seeks help from the only ...
Country: UK, Serbia, Croatia, Slovenia, Republic of Macedonia, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Hungary, Austria
